title: Geopolitical Developments Contribute to Elevated Diesel Prices
description:
Global refinery margins for diesel have widened since late October and increased to their highest level all year, following refinery outages in Russia and in the Middle East and new sanctions on Russia’s crude oil, leading to limited refinery production and a decreased global diesel supply. The impact was most ... [continued]

The post Geopolitical Developments Contribute to Elevated Diesel Prices appeared first on CleanTechnica.
